p: Forty-eight patients received forodesine (4 in phase 1, 44 in phase 2) (Fig. 1). Overall, the most common reasons for discontinuation were PD ( n = 35) and AEs ( n = 8). The study cohort had a median age of 69.5 years (range, 32–79 years) and had received a median of two prior treatment regimens (range, 1–9); most had PTCL-NOS (46%) or AITL (40%) (Table 1).
